title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8199-6.1 - Supplemental assessments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8199-6.1 - Supplemental assessments

State Regulations
(a) Where
land acquired by the State and subject to taxation pursuant to law is not
included on the list of such lands prepared in accordance with section
8199-4.1
of this

Part in the year of acquisition because the acquisition occurred after the
filing of the tentative assessment roll but before the date on which taxes
levied thereafter became a lien; a supplemental assessment of such parcel will
be submitted in accordance with this section. (b) The assessment of such land shall be that
assessment entered on the tentative assessment roll filed in the year in which
the land was acquired by the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8199-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
